name: Pony
description: The Pony is a small, sturdy breed of horse known for its strength and endurance, often used as a pack animal or mount for smaller creatures. It has a moderate build and is typically gentle and easy to train.
memorable: Ponies are valued for their resilience and utility in traveling across difficult terrain.
goals: To assist with transportation and carry loads in various environments.
relations: Commonly found with halflings or children as riders; often encountered on farms.
environment: Typically found in rural areas or farms.
strengths: Good Strength modifier allows for effective physical tasks and carrying loads.
weaknesses: Limited combat abilities and very low Intelligence and Charisma.
attacks: Can make a melee weapon attack with its hooves, dealing 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Draft Animal ability allows the Pony to push, drag, or lift weight three times its carrying capacity.
additional_information: Gentle and easy to train, ideal as a companion.
Can sustain some damage with 11 hit points.
Moderate speed of 40 feet supports short to moderate travel.
Basic offensive capabilities with melee attacks.
Serves effectively as a pack animal.
